name: IRySeasons
description:
★ My English is pretty basic. Please forgive me if I make any errors. ( ´•̥̥̥ω•̥̥̥` )★

Thank you for being here! This is a small STG Hololive fangame. Let's go through the seasons with IRyS! ヾ(*´∀ ˋ*)ﾉ

Recommend using fullscreen button to play in the browser, or download this game for full HD experience~ (੭ु´ ᐜ `)੭ु⁾⁾

♪

How to Play

Left click to use buttons.

Control

  • ↑ ↓ ← → to move player ship.
  • Space to shot.
  • Z to use skill card.
  • Esc to pause or continue.

♪

Credits Our HOPE: IRyS Ch. hololive-EN / IRyS Twitter

“Darkness will fade away, IRyS will light your way.” *ଘ(੭*ˊᵕˋ)੭* ੈ✩‧₊˚

Music

  • Bare your teeth
  • BERSERKER
  • Caesura of Despair
  • diorama
  • ENJOY! JOY!! JOYFUL!!!
  • HERE COMES HOPE
  • Nameless Sadness
  • See the world
  • Sparks of Joy
  • あかつきと花

Sound Effect

  • sfxr

♪

Disclaimers
